company.description: Fireworks AI provides a platform to build and optimize generative AI capabilities at scale, with a focus on fast inference and ease of model tuning. Their infrastructure supports various AI applications including code assistance, conversational AI, and enterprise search solutions.

funding_rounds.source: Fireworks AI raises $250M Series C to power the future of enterprise AI.
